resources.string: In accordance with CBN regulations, for compliance and documentation you will need to supply the following:
You can dial the short code (*565*0#)
Thank you for your submissions, We are currently reviewing your documents.

The Central Bank of Nigeria mandates strict Know Your Customer (KYC) document requirements for banks to ensure the integrity of the financial system. These requirements, which include proof of identity, address, income, and references, are crucial in preventing financial crimes like money laundering and fraud. They help establish transparency, identify beneficial owners, and monitor transactions, safeguarding both financial institutions and Nigeria\'s financial stability. Staying informed about these evolving requirements is essential for all customers. Read more
